title: Register
emailHelperText: Your email that we can use to identify you. Your email is only visible for you. We will not spam you.
usernameHelperText: Your username will show to other users.

updateAccountSettingsHelperText: Almost done! By setting your school and subject we will be able to automatically show you content based on them. You can also add these later.
registerCompleteText: Done! Please check your email for a link that you can use to verify your account.
